categories: Category:Military officers of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Sarnova was a Human female captain, nicknamed Duchess by her troops, who served the reconstituted Sith Empire on the Sith capital planet of Dromund Kaas. Stationed outside the rogue Sith Lord Grathan's estate, she was tasked with sending her troops into the estate to fight Grathan's troops. Her men, however, were all captured, and she enlisted the aid of a more capable Imperial to find out what had become of them.
